description: JSON Schema for environment_characteristics class in Elephant Lexicon

air_quality_compliance.description: Whether area is in attainment for all EPA ambient air quality standards.

air_quality_index.description: EPA Air Quality Index category indicating typical air pollution levels for the area.

beach_proximity.description: Details about nearby beach access if applicable.

earthquake_zone.description: Seismic zone designation or earthquake risk classification for the area.

environmental_hazards.description: List of additional environmental hazards present in the area (e.g., 'Radon', 'Industrial Pollution', 'Mining Activity').

environmental_surroundings.description: Primary environmental setting surrounding the property.

fire_zone.description: Wildfire risk zone or fire district designation indicating wildfire hazard level and emergency response district.

flood_insurance_required.description: Whether flood insurance is required for the property.

flood_risk_level.description: Flood risk assessment based on FEMA flood zone data.

flood_zone_designation.description: FEMA flood zone designation (e.g., 'Zone X', 'Zone AE').

hurricane_engineering_compliance.description: Whether building is engineered for hurricane winds per current code.

light_pollution_level.description: Light pollution level affecting night sky visibility and natural darkness.

noise_level.description: Ambient noise level in the area affecting quality of life and property desirability.

noise_sources.description: Specific sources of noise in the area.

radon_building_type_assessment.description: Radon risk specific to building type (e.g., 'rarely an issue in low-rise wood frame condos').

request_identifier.description: Identifier value that should be substituted into the source HTTP request to retrieve this specific data.

soil_stability.description: Soil stability assessment considering factors like erosion, subsidence, and landslide risk.

source_http_request.description: HTTP request configuration for retrieving this data.

body.description: The body of the request, which may contain JSON or other data formats.

content-type.description: Content-Type header for the request, indicating the media type of the resource.

url.description: The URL endpoint for the request.

wildfire_risk_level.description: Standardized wildfire risk assessment based on vegetation, weather patterns, topography, and fire history.

wind_storm_risk.description: Wind storm and hurricane risk assessment.

title: environment_characteristics
